EmailTemplate.name: Lacerte - First Touch
EmailTemplate.subject: Following up on your Lacerte Evaluation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for your recent interest in Lacerte® Tax! I understand you requested a free evaluation copy of our tax software and I’d love to speak with you regarding your practice and learn what is prompting you to shop for new tax software in the first place.
Once I better understand your situation and your specific needs, I’ll be able to address questions I’m sure you have like…
What was the availability and response time of your technical support team last tax season? Do you have data conversion for my current software and if so, what can be converted? Do you have a solution that fits my budget?
I can also provide you with learning tools such as online tutorials and live webinars that will help you make the most of your evaluation period.
I look forward to speaking with you soon. Let me know if there’s a time that works best for you.
{!User.Name} Lacerte Tax Consultant {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
IMPORTANT: Intuit respects the personal nature of email communication. Every effort is made to offer only information that may be of value to you or your business. If you do not wish to receive marketing email from Intuit in the future, please click here.
If you have any questions or comments, please DO NOT REPLY to this email. Contact Customer Service at 800.765.7777 for assistance. If you receive an email message that appears to come from Intuit but that you suspect is a phishing email, please forward it immediately to spoof@intuit.com.
